Float Left

This is a tree. Trees are the best, because they give us oxygen to breathe. They also turn into pretty colors in the fall. There are different kinds of trees that are different colors and shapes.

Float Right

Bicycle riding is a relaxing hobby that is enjoyed by many. It's an oppritunity to go outside and enjoy the air blowing on your face. You can also greet other people you pass by, like neighbors and other bikers.
